Four elements of a network:

- Devices
- Medium
- Messages
- Rules
You can listen to your favorite radio show on your portable audio player whenever you have the time and wherever you are. Every time a new show becomes available, it can be automatically downloaded.
You can express your thoughts online, share your photos, and join a community of fellow thinkers.
Instant messaging is everywhere and can include audio and video conversations. IM can send text messages to mobile phones.
